questions.skill_area: Describe core architectural components of Azure
questions.question: Is an Azure Availability Zone typically made up of multiple datacenters within a single Azure region?
Does Azure Queue Storage provide file sharing capabilities similar to Azure File Storage?

questions.skill_area: Describe the differences between categories of cloud services
questions.question: Compare and contrast Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS) in the context of Azure. What are the main responsibilities of the user versus Microsoft in each model?
scoring_criteria: Define both IaaS and PaaS in Azure context.
Describe what the user manages in IaaS versus PaaS.
Describe what Microsoft manages in IaaS versus PaaS.
Give at least one Azure example for each category.
Discuss a use case suitable for each model.

questions.question: Explain how the Azure Pricing Calculator and Azure Cost Management tool can be used together to help control and predict cloud spending.
scoring_criteria: Describe the function of the Azure Pricing Calculator.
Describe the function of Azure Cost Management.
Explain how estimates from the Pricing Calculator inform budgeting.
Explain ongoing monitoring and alerts via Cost Management.
Discuss the benefits of using both tools throughout a project's lifecycle.
